values.value: Site Critical Element* - Equipment selection and utilization shall not allow for an employee to free fall more than 6ft, or contact a lower level. Y-lanyard anchorage connectors shall never be connected below the elevation of the user's back d-ring. Self Retracting Devices and lifeline/rope grab systems must be used with-in the parameters of the manufacturer and industry standards. CFR 1926.502
Are all elevated employees properly utilizing their PFAS equipment to minimize free fall and total fall distances?
